question: Which among the following sentence is INCORRECT regarding Foreign Currency Non Resident (FCNR) accounts in India ?
option1: Accounts in foreign currencies (FCNR accounts) can be maintained by NRIs with authorized dealers in India.
option2: FCNR Accounts can be maintained in Pound Sterling, U.S.Dollar, Deutsche Mark, Japanese Yen and Euro
option3: FCNR accounts can be maintained only in the form of current / savings account as well as ‘term deposits’
answer: FCNR accounts can be maintained only in the form of current / savings account as well as ‘term deposits’
